item.title: Wing Fueling Station Quantity Indicating System

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided preselect refueling is not used.

placard.para: Placard at refuel panel: "WING REFUEL STATION QTY IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Use the manual mode fueling procedure (AMM 12-11-01/301). Use the flight deck fuel synoptic or measuring sticks (AMM 28-44-00/001) to ensure that the correct amount of fuel has been loaded.

note.para: If the flight deck fuel synoptic is blank for one or more tanks, the automatic fuel shutoff for the related tank(s) will be inoperative.
